import { useState } from "react"; const AddTask = ({taskList,setTaskList}) => { const [addModal, setAddModal]= useState(false); const [projectName, setProjectName]= useState(""); const [taskDescription, setTaskDescription]= useState(""); const handleInput= e =>{ const name=e.target.name; const value=e.target.value; if (name === "projectName") setProjectName(value) if (name=== "taskDescription") setTaskDescription(value) } const handleAdd= e => { e.preventDefault(); setTaskList( [...taskList, {projectName, taskDescription}] ); setAddModal(false); setProjectName(""); setTaskDescription(""); } return( <> {addModal ? ( <>
